author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Correct the PU correction code and streamline the fitting code for IsoTrack calibration

#### PR validation:

Tested and used to obtain post legacy calibration constants for HB/HE energy scale factors

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Need no back porting
title: Run2-alca153 Correct the calibration algos
